mapper.select: select Airport_Id as airport_id, Airport_Name as airport_name, Time_Zone as time_zone, count(Flight_Num) as total_arriving_flights, departing_flights as total_departing_flights, avg_departing as avg_departing_flight_cost from ( select Airport_ID, Airport_Name, Time_Zone, count(Flight_Num) as departing_flights, avg(cost) as avg_departing from airport left join Flight on Airport_Id = FROM_Airport group by Airport_ID ) as departing left join Flight on Airport_ID = To_Airport group by Airport_ID;
